name: Drift Dodge Drive - 3D Drive! for MadeWithDefoldJam
name_original: Drift Dodge Drive - 3D Drive! for MadeWithDefoldJam
description:
Drive, drift and dodge in 3 mini driving games.

I decided to try out the 3D development side for the Defold Game Engine. This was my entry to the #MadeWithDefoldJam . 

There are 2 mini games and 1 driving simulation.

Give it a go. Full project source code is available for download.
